analysis.description:
ERC20StandardToken.decimals (/unique_chucks/30/0xa5ab0ef3ef3711d8ecfe0a7ba42745cbcfb549cc.sol#90) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- getRealTokenAmount (/unique_chucks/30/0xa5ab0ef3ef3711d8ecfe0a7ba42745cbcfb549cc.sol#150-154)

ERC20StandardToken.tokensIssued (/unique_chucks/30/0xa5ab0ef3ef3711d8ecfe0a7ba42745cbcfb549cc.sol#91-92) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/30/0xa5ab0ef3ef3711d8ecfe0a7ba42745cbcfb549cc.sol#107-108)

TokenPool.setTrustee (/unique_chucks/30/0xa5ab0ef3ef3711d8ecfe0a7ba42745cbcfb549cc.sol#257-264) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.approve(trustee,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/30/0xa5ab0ef3ef3711d8ecfe0a7ba42745cbcfb549cc.sol#259-262)
	-token.approve(trustee,0) (/unique_chucks/30/0xa5ab0ef3ef3711d8ecfe0a7ba42745cbcfb549cc.sol#263)

TokenPool.returnTokensTo (/unique_chucks/30/0xa5ab0ef3ef3711d8ecfe0a7ba42745cbcfb549cc.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(to,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/30/0xa5ab0ef3ef3711d8ecfe0a7ba42745cbcfb549cc.sol)

ERC20StandardToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xa5ab0ef3ef3711d8ecfe0a7ba42745cbcfb549cc.sol#90)
ERC20StandardToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xa5ab0ef3ef3711d8ecfe0a7ba42745cbcfb549cc.sol#88)
ERC20StandardToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xa5ab0ef3ef3711d8ecfe0a7ba42745cbcfb549cc.sol#89-90)
ERC20StandardToken.tokensIssued should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xa5ab0ef3ef3711d8ecfe0a7ba42745cbcfb549cc.sol#91-92)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/30/0xa5ab0ef3ef3711d8ecfe0a7ba42745cbcfb549cc.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.10 (/unique_chucks/30/0xa5ab0ef3ef3711d8ecfe0a7ba42745cbcfb549cc.sol#6-8): it allows old versions
